greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of connected functions on n points with a loop of length k.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (rows 1..50)
formula: G.f. of k-th column: (1/k)*Sum_{d|k} phi(d) * r(x^d)^(k/d) where r(x) is the g.f. of A000081.
program: TreeGf(N) = {my(A=vector(N, j, 1)); for (n=1, N-1, A[n+1] = 1/n * sum(k=1, n, sumdiv(k, d, d*A[d]) * A[n-k+1] ) ); x*Ser(A)}
ColSeq(n,k)={my(r=TreeGf(max(0,n+1-k))); Vec(sumdiv(k, d, eulerphi(d)*subst(r + O(x*x^(n\d)), x, x^d)^(k/d))/k, -n)}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 03 2020
